transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Ranjit sir good evening Reena baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Ji ji aapka jo concern ek open hua tha 9696 pe regarding refund right Ankita ji se baat bhi hui thi aapki Ankita ji se baat hui thi aapki aapne jo concern open kiya tha 9696 pe refund ke liye aapne asking kiya tha sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To I hope sir Ankita ne sari cheeze clear kar diya hoga ki refund to possible nahi hai rahi baat ki aap bata rahe ho jo bhi inquiry fake aa rahi hai uske regarding suniye na suniye aisa hai mam suniye na refund to possible nahi hai court khula hua hai court ke through pahuchenge kya dikkat hai main paisa diya hu aapko business ke liye main court ke through pahuchenge aapke paas yehi baat batao court pe sir bilkul aap jao beshak aap ja sakte ho koi issue nahi hai lekin aap court ke baad nahi karna hai aapko baat to sun lo court ko kya dikhaoge sir proposal to dikhaoge na proposal mein kahin mention hai ki refund ki policy aapko waha se refund milega aapne proposal suniye suniye sab sab cheez hai.
Executive: Kisne aapko recording bol raha hai kisne bola hai sir refund ke liye aap naam to batao mujhe recording kiski aap baat kar rahe ho.
Customer: Mr. Sarvesh.
Executive: Kya naam hai?
Customer: Sarvesh Sarvesh jo aapka banda tha.
Executive: Sarvesh Hashmi ki Alam ki baat kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Wo mujhe dekhna padega.
Executive: Aap dekh lijiye sir unhone kya bola tha sir aapko?
Customer: Ki aapko business nahi milega inquiry nahi milega to aapko ye kiya jayega paisa refund kar denge jitna din hai utna paisa ka.
Executive: Sarvesh naam hai ya Sarvesh naam hai Sarvesh ki baat kar rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Sarvesh Sarvesh Sarvesh sab main aise baat nahi karunga na aap dekh ke aap apne hisab se chaliye main apne hisab se chalunga aap paisa leke agar mujhe business nahi milega to main paisa aapko aise nahi dunga.
Executive: Unhone kahin mail pe aapko ye cheeze likh ke diya tha sir?
Customer: Are sab cheez mere paas mein hai main aise nahi hawa mein baat nahi karta hu aap mera paisa dijiye.
Executive: Mail bhi hai aapke paas mail bhi hai.
Customer: Are hamesha bol rahe hain.
Executive: Haan aap hawa mein baat nahi karte hain.
Customer: Court hai court mein hai na court se to aapne bhag rahe hain.
Executive: Mere paas recording sari cheez hai matlab mail to unhone kahin mention kiya hai sir.
Customer: Ab kya hai nahi hai sab leke chalunga main paisa diya hu aapko isliye nahi ki mera paisa le lo aap.
Executive: Mail bhi share karo na sir aap wo cheeze sari recording detail aap hame share karo.
Customer: Kuch share nahi karenge direct court mein leke chalenge.
Executive: To fir to yaha se aap agar aap hame share nahi karoge to I am just going to close your concern further aap jo bhi aap apna jo aap bata rahe ho ki mujhe haan main court mein jaunga legal action lunga to aap apne according wo cheeze kar sakte ho abhi main aapka concern yaha pe close kar rahi hu sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi aap kar do kya dikkat hai aapko aap jo aapko achcha lagta hai.
Executive: Kyunki aap hame mujhe to koi proof nahi share kar rahe ho na sir how can I how can I help you aap mujhe agar share hi nahi karne ko ready ho ab aapko direct court se hi deal karna hai to it's your call sir aap kar sakte ho koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Aur mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Kyunki aap mujhe nahi share kar rahe ho koi bhi data apna.
Customer: Mam main aapko seedhe se baat sir jab tak main dekhungi nahi ki unhone kya commitment diya ki aapki buylead bhi aa rahi hai aapke paas inquiries bhi mahine ki aa rahi hai proper fir bhi aapko koi business nahi mil raha kaise ye possible hai sir.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute agar mere paas lead sahi nahi hoga to mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai agar mujhe nahi milega to ye to mujhe dikkat hai na.
Executive: To buylead to aap purchase kar rahe ho uske baad business dekho maturity ki guarantee kaun leta hai sir hum to aapko buylead provide kara sakte hain na IndiaMART to matchmaking platform hai hum aapko buyer laake de sakte hain convert karna to aapka wo kaam hai na sir.
Customer: Aap mere paas mein buyer agar sahi aap dikha hi denge galat buyer denge jo hamara baat hua hai ki main steel ka koi aise baat hi nahi aluminium selling 1000 kg 2000 kg wo mera concept kuch hai hi nahi to main kaise dunga wo bataiye mere ko kyun mere paas aap pehle video mein aao to bulk quantity ki lead nahi aa rahi hum usko dekhte hain kahan problem aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Main video mein aata hu kal aap mere ko kal mere 11 baje ye kijiye main 11 baje aapko video call mein aata hu dekh leta hu mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai aap meri baat suniye meri baat suniye mere paas mein Mr. Sarvesh se jo baat hua hai tab mera pehle tha 99 mein to band kar diya uske baad bhi usne diya uske baad bhi main nahi daba raha tha aaj main pakda sab kuch kiya abhi wo kya phone mein utha raha hai to aap logo ka company ka policy ka kya hai.
Executive: Aapne bhi call Sarvesh ko aapne Sarvesh ko call kis cheez ke regarding kiya tha?
Customer: Aapne mere sath ye bola mera kuch business mein aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai aap pura paisa refund kar do nahi hota mera paisa jitna din ka hua paisa kaat ke mera paisa refund kar do ye to koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Possible nahi hai na sir refund ki to policy hai hi na ab unhone aapko kuch commitment kiya aap mujhe share karoge taki main aage baat karungi usse sir.
Customer: Dekhiye wo baad mein wo main baad mein share karunga jab yaha se agar nahi hota hai mera jo abhi tak aap mujhe ek baat batao na verbally karega aap mujhe recording to share karoge na aapko refund ke liye kisi ne commitment kiya hai to aapke paas proof hai aap mujhe share karoge tab to main aage highlight karungi na ye cheeze.
Customer: Sabse pehli baat jo banda baat kiya jo banda baat kiya phone kyun nahi uthaya chor ke jaise kyun aaya main aapse puchna chahta hu chor jaisa kyun hai main aapse pehle baat batata hu.
Executive: Sir main ye to Sarvesh se main baat karungi koi issue nahi hai baki abhi ek kaam karte hain 11 baje kal ek Google Meet.
Customer: Main wahi cheez main aapko puchna chahta hu agar aap sahi ho to aapko baat karne mein kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Haan wo abhi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Aap chor ke jaise baat kyun karte ho ek insan ka ek insaniyat hoti hai na ye kutta bilai jaisa to platform nahi hai ye jo baat karta hai Sarvesh kutta bilai jaisa jab nahi payment ja raha tha din bhar phone karte the sir main aapko hath uthaunga pair uthaunga aapko kabhi aisa problem nahi sun pad raha hoga main aapko same time aapko phone ka response karunga jab mera problem hua theek hai problem hua to help kaun karega aap hi karenge na jab main payment diya hu aap hi kyun help karna padega na aap dekho payment ki help ki baat hai sir meri baat suniye main aap mujhe bolne dijiye aap please mat boliye aap nahi to aap bolenge main bolunga.
Executive: Bolo sir aap bolo pehle.
Customer: Jab aapko baat aisa hai to aap mera phone uthayenge kya ho raha hai jo cheeze mere joining mein nahi hai mera pehle bhi bola gaya ki mera waha pe aluminium section mujhe supply nahi karna hai mujhe window pura bana ke wo mera sir abhi tak follow up nahi wo approve karke aaya nahi kyun nahi aluminium mein aluminium sliding mein aapko deal nahi kar raha aap ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Aluminium sliding mujhe deal karna hai aluminium section pe deal nahi karna hai mujhe.
Executive: Achcha wo galat mein leke main paisa kyun aluminium section aapke catalog mein added hai sir category.
Customer: Main humne to kitna policy bataya ki mujhe nahi chahiye aap main hata de rahi hu main hata deti hu aluminium section aap aap aap meri baat suniye pehle sabse pehle jo cheez mujhe chahiye wo cheez aap nahi denge aur jo cheez nahi chahiye wo mujhe denge bolte 5000 ke wo marks chahiye uska inquiry aa gaya to sir main mujhe bolne dijiye theek to main aapko 100 baar bola wo mujhe nahi chahiye mujhe business kyun nahi ho raha hai aap to main wahi to keh rahi hu aluminium section ab sir aap meri to sune aluminium section nahi chahiye to catalog se category jo added hai usko remove kar do na hata do na main catalog se.
Customer: Phone mein kaise rahega aap yahi cheez category jo aapne add kiya nahi humne kiya nahi kiya humne bola kya batao mujhe is video kaise dalenge kahan se main kaun sa lead karunga ek baar mere ko batao samjhao wo bhi aise mere baad mein baat karta hai.
Executive: Matlab kya hai aaj aap aise phone kitna din pehle kyun nahi phone kiya mujhe kya aapko kya pareshani ho raha hai nahi ho raha hai kyun nahi itna din pehle aap phone kiya mujhe sir abhi aapka account abhi aapka account Ankita handle kar rahi hai wo to aapko service ke liye call karti hai na sir ye batao na mujhe.
Customer: Ji ji karti hai karti hai to wahi baat hota hai ki aise karo waise mein mera kuch business nahi hai wo bhi dikhata hu bhi aata hai mujhe to aapne Ankita ko kabhi bola ki mujhe aluminium section mein deal nahi karna bola bola bola bola bola.
Executive: Aap kal 11 baje kijiye call main direct kar raha hu.
Customer: Chaliye 11 baje video meet karte hain sir theek hai theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to lack of business.

- Allegedly promised refund by a IndiaMART employee.

- Expresses frustration with irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to investigate the issue.

- Agreed to a video meet at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet scheduled for further discussion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, aluminium, commitment, policy
